name: Patrol-16
description:
Controls: 

Z to start the game and restart when you get hit.
Right/left arrows to rotate shields clockwise/counterclockwise.
X to shoot.

Notes: 
- You collect ammo by blocking bullets. ammo appears at the bottom left of the screen.
- You need 2 ammo to shoot once.
- Your shields together block in 6 directions, leaving you vulnerable in only 2 directions (the ones in which you are shooting). Use them well!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In the depths of Space, the Patrols keep vigil on their sectors. At the slightest hint of a threat, they are dispatched.  Their meticulous coordination and robotic perfection have made them the most fearful force in the Galaxy for the past 200 years. 

Sector-16 lies deep within Octant III. An enemy would need unimaginable strength to invade so deep into Federal territory...

"Dispatch to Patrol-16... 
High foreign activity detected in Sector-16...
Potential threats detected in Sector-16...
Patrol-16, please head out immediately...
Dispatch to Patrol-16..."

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a short demo. Please enjoy!
